entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3.

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 06:40 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
